title: Migrate to Cloud Infrastructure
description: Move from on-premise to AWS cloud services by Q2 2026. This will improve scalability and reduce operational costs.
assumptions: AWS pricing remains stable;Team has cloud skills;Contract termination without penalties
constraints: Budget: $500k maximum;Timeline: Must complete by June 2026

title: Increase Marketing Budget
description: Allocate $200k for Q2 product launch campaigns. Focus on digital advertising and influencer partnerships.
assumptions: Market conditions favorable;ROI target 3x achievable;Competition does not launch similar products
constraints: Budget Policy: Cannot exceed $200k;Must align with annual marketing strategy

title: Implement Remote-First Policy
description: Adopt permanent remote-first work policy starting March 1, 2026. Employees can work from home with optional office access.
assumptions: Productivity remains at current levels;Collaboration tools are sufficient;Office lease can be downsized
constraints: HR Policy compliance;Must provide home office stipend

title: Adopt TypeScript for New Projects
description: All new software projects will use TypeScript instead of JavaScript. Aims to reduce errors and improve maintainability.
assumptions: Team willing to learn TypeScript;Migration time manageable;Tooling integrates well
constraints: Must maintain current deployment pipeline;No impact on production systems

title: Outsource Tier 1 Customer Support
description: Partner with external vendor for Tier 1 customer support starting April 2026. 12-month contract with extension option.
assumptions: Vendor maintains quality standards;Cost savings offset fees within 6 months;Knowledge transfer in 4 weeks
constraints: SLA: 95% response within 2 hours;Customer satisfaction must not decline
